creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: wide rim bowl, adorned only at upper rim by six sprouting seedlings set equally around rim and joined stems to each other at outer rim; part of same set as .26.1-3 trays
markings: at edge of underside: [DENMARK] (crown)/oval [GEORG JENSEN] [228D] oval [GI/925/5] [STERLING] [TO OUR NEPHEW FREDERICK WEYERHAEUSER III AND HIS BRIDE MARGARET GERTRUDE LUDWIG FROM ELSIE WEYERHAEUSER AND HER HUSBAND WILLIAM BANCROFT HILL AND CHARLES AUGUSTUS WEYERHAEUSER AND HIS WIFE MAUD MOON, 1929]
title: Bowl, one of a pair
